Jamaican Grill

Welcome to Jamaican Grill. We serve Curry chicken, turkey wings, fried chicken and curry goat etc. We are located on Rivers Ave, near to Charleston Heights Motel. Order online for carryout today!

Cuisines
American Chicken Coffee and Tea Curry Dessert Fish Jamaican Pasta Pub Food Ribs Salads Seafood Soup Wings 
Atmosphere
Casual Dining 4245 RIVERS AVE
 NORTH CHARLESTON, SC 29405 (843) 793-4859 
Business Hours
Mon - Thu: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM Fri & Sat: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM Sun: Closed
